name: Sparkle Snapshots 3D
synopsis: Have fun taking and customising your own unique photos, and see where your imagination leads you! Sparkle Snapshots 3D lets you get snap-happy with the cameras on your Nintendo 3DS system. Decorate your photos with frames, backgrounds, stamps and your own doodles, then share your creations with friends wirelessly! (Please note: photos taken with this software will not display in 3D.) There is a self-timer so you can easily put yourself in the picture. You can also connect to the Sparkle SnapShop to purchase new content which is sure to spark your imagination!
